name: D/D/D Sky King Zeus Ragnarok
text:
2+ "D/D" monsters
You can target 1 "D/D" or "Dark Contract" card you control; destroy it, also, during your Main Phase this turn, you can conduct 1 Pendulum Summon of a "D/D" monster(s) in addition to your Pendulum Summon. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) When your opponent activates a monster effect in the hand (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "D/D" monster and 1 "Dark Contract" card from your GY; negate the activation. You can only use this effect of "D/D/D Sky King Zeus Ragnarok" once per turn.
